final_poem:
In tick and tock, moments cascade like sand,  
Each grain a fleeting second in life's grandstand;   
A symphony of seconds dances through time’rannever-ending tune—a rhythm so divine!
With each passing minute we chase the horizon line. 
In every tick and tock lies memories, love sublime:  
Yet these fragile moments are but a transient prime;   
They slip through fingers like water that in rivers does shine—fleeting traces of time's unstoppable chime!
